blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.body:
Why do we use it?
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).


Where does it come from?
Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.

Where can I get some?
There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.
blogs.author: mario

blogs.author: yoshi

blogs.title: Life of university student in India
blogs.body:
Hi everyone, welcome to my blog where I share my experiences as a university student in India. Today I want to tell you about a typical day in my life here and why I love studying in this amazing country.

I wake up around 8 am and get ready for my classes. I live in a hostel on campus, which is designed by a famous architect and has natural ventilation. It's like living in a giant treehouse with all my friends. The best part is that I always bump into someone I know on my way to class.

I have breakfast at the mess hall, which serves delicious food from different regions of India. I usually go for a dosa, which is a thin rice pancake stuffed with potatoes and spices, or an idli, which is a steamed rice cake. I also drink some milk to get some calcium for my bones.

My first class starts at 10 am and lasts for an hour and a half. I study engineering, which is very challenging but also rewarding. I learn about new technologies and how to apply them to solve real-world problems. My professors are very knowledgeable and helpful, and they encourage us to participate in class discussions.

After two classes, I have lunch at the mess hall again. This time I try some North Indian dishes like roti, which is a flatbread, and dal, which is a lentil soup. I also have some salad and yogurt to balance my diet. I eat with my friends and we chat about our plans for the weekend.

I take a short nap after lunch to recharge my energy. Then I head to the library to do some homework and research. The library has a huge collection of books and journals, as well as computers and internet access. I can find anything I need for my studies here.

In the evening, I go to the gym or play some sports with my friends. There are many facilities on campus for physical activities, such as tennis courts, basketball courts, cricket grounds, and swimming pools. I like to stay fit and healthy, and also have some fun.

I have dinner at the mess hall again, or sometimes I order some food from outside. There are many options for delivery services, such as Uber Eats or Ola Foods. Sometimes I treat myself to some pizza or Chinese food.

After dinner, I watch some TV or play some games with my friends. We also have some cultural events on campus, such as music concerts, dance shows, or movie screenings. There is always something happening here.

I go to bed around midnight and get ready for another day of learning and adventure.

That's it for today's blog post. I hope you enjoyed reading about my life as a university student in India. If you have any questions or comments, please leave them below. And don't forget to subscribe to my blog for more updates.

Thank you for reading!
blogs.author: yoshi

blogs.title: SPACE
blogs.body:
Space has always been a fascinating subject for humans, and the more we learn about it, the more awe-inspiring it becomes. From the mysteries of black holes to the possibilities of life on other planets, space exploration has captured our imaginations for centuries. In this blog post, we'll explore some of the most interesting topics in space and share some of the latest discoveries and advancements in the field.

One of the most exciting topics in space is the search for extraterrestrial life. In recent years, scientists have discovered thousands of exoplanets, or planets outside of our solar system, and some of them have the potential to support life. The discovery of water on Mars has also sparked interest in the possibility of life on the red planet.

Another fascinating subject in space is black holes. These mysterious objects are formed from the collapse of massive stars, and their intense gravity is so strong that not even light can escape. In recent years, scientists have been able to capture images of black holes for the first time, thanks to the Event Horizon Telescope project.

Space exploration has also led to advancements in technology that have benefited us here on Earth. For example, the materials used in space suits have led to more durable and heat-resistant fabrics used in firefighting gear and other protective clothing. NASA's research on plant growth in space has also led to advancements in agriculture, as scientists have found ways to grow crops in harsh environments.

In addition to these exciting developments, space exploration has also sparked philosophical questions about our place in the universe. As we discover more about the vastness of space and our own insignificance in comparison, we are forced to consider the meaning of life and our place in the grand scheme of things.

In conclusion, space is a fascinating subject that offers endless possibilities for exploration and discovery. From the search for extraterrestrial life to the mysteries of black holes, there is always something new and exciting to learn about this vast and awe-inspiring universe. As we continue to push the boundaries of space exploration, we can only imagine what other incredible discoveries and advancements are waiting to be made.
blogs.author: mario
